page.title: 13Stithians show Atmosphere
page.content: There is quiet at first while the tents patiently wait for the first entry. The first few people come to get their flower arrangements ready for the day ahead. Then come more and more people. At eleven o'clock the visitors cars start arriving and the police are kept busy directing traffic. The noise gets louder as all the show sounds merge together. Soon the playing field is full of people avoiding the boys having water pistol fights. The rest are looking at the pets, farm animals, paintings and flower arrangements. They also buy things from stalls.Some people head for the show jumping to watch the power of the horses jumping in real life.Then in the evening one by one the people fade out leaving only the litter behind.
